entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
